title: American Horror Story Cult: I am LOVING the LOURD!
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: She is so amazing, I want her to be in the next 2 seasons
Yes, I'd like to see her for the rest of the series, too! <3
I really hope she will be back for season 8!!
Loving all the new content this season has your spark reignited
Just pointing it out when ivy and winter where in the car ivy said that ozz asked if winter was going to be his 3rd mouther.
description:
I am loving Billie Lourd on American Horror Story Cult and hope the show retains her for the next two seasons.
